column5: Havnt fished for over a week now since Eck and his crew left.Wayne called me and said I should come and fish as shacks were open a couple days so got over there at 9.Drilled one hole and used a 1/16 oz hair jigs I made and found a small minnow that I put on it and watched it ever so slowly fall on my sonar.Lots of fish on the bottom and when the jig got to about 6 ft from the bottom a walleye would dart up and take it.4 drops 4 fish kinda day.Had 30-40 minutes of that and then it kinda slowed down but kept catching pretty steady.Stayed till noon,Wayne came for a visit and then I took of home.3 fun hours.
Brings back memory's for sure!I'm now giving my wife orders around the house as she is a crew member,and I'm the captain of the ship.lol
Yeah sure Ron.lol.To bad you weren't there was kinda quite.lol.
Can't seem to get vid up from Clark's new Glacier ice fishing trailer.Its on there website if you want to see it.Beautifull rig.Sleeps 6.
